name: cursor-goalguard
description: Two-layer agent harness for Cursor: Supervisor (user-facing) delegates to Worker/Verifier subagents + .ai workspace memory. No API keys.

goalguard.autoPromptOnOpen.description: Show a prompt to enable GoalGuard when opening a workspace that is not initialized.

goalguard.preferDirectPromptCommand.description: Try Cursor-specific command to open Agent chat with a prompt. Falls back to clipboard paste.

goalguard.showStatusBar.description: Show a small status bar indicator when GoalGuard is enabled.

goalguard.mode.description: Auto: try subagents first. Subagents: assume delegation works. Single-chat: never rely on subagents.

scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run verify -- . && node scripts/test-catch-failure.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run compile
scripts.prove-subagents: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('.vscode',{recursive:true}); require('fs').copyFileSync('plans/goalguard-works.plan.json','.vscode/cursor-extension-tester.plan.json'); var p=require('path').resolve('.'); console.log('Plan staged. From cursor-extension-tester run:\nnpm run cli -- run --workspace '+p+' --plan '+p+'/plans/goalguard-works.plan.json --target-vsix '+p+'/cursor-goalguard-0.1.0.vsix --cursor-version 2.4.32');"
